title: FT to Back Nuts: T206 Lundgren Piedmont 350!!!
author: Tao_Moko

posts.post_title: FT to Back Nuts: T206 Lundgren Piedmont 350!!!
posts.post_content:
I am kicking around the idea of trading this card for the chance at another Cubs subset.  I am not applying a value as with only 5 confirmed copies it will be worth what someone is willing to trade for it.  

My interests:

Any grouping of Cubs from a T or E set.  I'm not overly concerned with grade but prefer no paperloss.  I also am fine with raw cards and do not apply any additional value to TPG cards.

This post won't remain for more then a few days so if you offer a trade you don't have to wait forever to get trumped.

Contact me at [url]esharpwork@gmail.com[/url] 

Thanks,

Eric
